original_text: Perhaps you will say to each other, ‘The people of these nations are stronger than we are. We cannot chase them away.’
korean_text: 네가 혹시 심중에 이르기를 이 민족들이 나보다 많으니 내가 어찌 그를 쫓아낼 수 있으리요 하리라마는

sentences.original_text: Perhaps you will say to each other
The people of these nations are stronger than we are
